thread.title: Umm. Is Upen Patel Accusing Karishma Tanna Of Breaking His Heart?
thread.title_full: Umm. Is Upen Patel Accusing Karishma Tanna Of Breaking His Heart?

author: Team MissMalini
title: Umm. Is Upen Patel Accusing Karishma Tanna Of Breaking His Heart?
text:
Team MissMalini Mar . 21 . 2017 Karishma Tanna and Upen Patel 
Upen Patel and Karishma Tanna , fondly known as # UpMa , by their fans broke many hearts when they parted ways last year. They recently sparked off rumours of a possible reconciliation when they were spotted together at a lunch date in Bandra. 
Ever since then, Upen has been posting break-up quotes on Twitter, slyly hinting that he may have faced betrayal during his relationship with Karishma. Have a look:
